Package DynaBlast

Class Graphic

  • java.lang.Object
    • DynaBlast.Graphic
  • public class Graphic
extends java.lang.Object
    class that is responsible for running and drawing animations for all moving objects

      • Graphic

        public Graphic​(int speed,
               java.awt.image.BufferedImage img1,
               java.awt.image.BufferedImage img2,
               java.awt.image.BufferedImage img3,
               java.awt.image.BufferedImage img4)
        constructor of the class, that sets images for animation cycle as well as its speed and length of animation cycle
        Parameters:
        speed - specifies how fast animation should be played
        img1 - first image of animation cycle
        img2 - second image of animation cycle
        img3 - third image of animation cycle
        img4 - fourth image of animation cycle

      • drawAnimation

        public void drawAnimation​(java.awt.Graphics g,
                          double x,
                          double y)
        function that directly draws animation cycle
        Parameters:
        g - Graphic to which render images
        x - x-location of object for which the animation should be drawn
        y - y-location of object for which the animation should be drawn
